index_text_1: Would you like to take a ride in a special car? Whether it's for a wedding, a prom or any other occasion, we have what you need in our beautiful region of Saguenay Lac-St-Jean. Come visit us. Several cars are at your disposal.
index_text_2: For more information, do not hesitate to contact us. Also, if you liked your experience with us, tell your friends and on your next visit you will be entitled to a discount.
services_cars_text: Whether it's for a wedding, a prom or any other occasion, our cars are among the most beautiful in the region.
services_drivers_text: The driver service allows you to move around the region without worrying about the road.
services_photos_text: For a special occasion or to impress your friends, a professional photographer can immortalize you with the car of your choice.
prices_content_photoshoot: (Photo session including 5 digital photos and a paper photo)
login_reserv: * This section is reserved for the administration
